mapper.select: select mb.*, s3.id as s3id, s3.cdn_url from main_banner mb join s3file_data s3fd on mb.id = s3fd.row_id and s3fd.group_name = 'main_banner' join s3file s3 on s3fd.s3file_id = s3.id where banner_type = 'middle-rolling' and mb.status = 'A' order by mb.sort desc;

SELECT * FROM newsletter_subscriber where name = #{name} and email = #{email} limit 1
